ygData.subject: Re: Searching for wreckage
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe one of the good gnomes on this list that owns a tinkering site will do this for us? Because it is a good idea, not only the oot searchthing but also
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe one of the good gnomes on this list that owns a tinkering site will do
this for us? Because it is a good idea, not only the oot searchthing but
also failed rumours, I have yet to try crushed dufrenite, but that will be
tried in a very near future and if it fails, It would be good to have it
mentioned more than on this list so that no others spend their hard earned,
and much needed tinkering money to fail on the same thing.

keep up the good work

-Sandortien
